H0.text: when did virgin australia ( formerly virgin blue ) commence flying in australia. August 2000

H1.text: when did virgin australia ( formerly virgin blue ) commence flying in australia. February 2001

H2.text: when did virgin australia ( formerly virgin blue ) commence flying in australia. October 1998

H3.text: when did virgin australia ( formerly virgin blue ) commence flying in australia. November 1999

A4.text: It commenced services on 31 August 2000 with two aircraft on a single route.

A5.text: Virgin Australia was launched as Virgin Blue, a low-cost airline, in August 2000, with two Boeing 737-400 aircraft.
